name: The Story of Goodness Online (Pre-Beta 3+)
description:
Pre-Beta 3+ is an outdated version that has been uploaded for nostalgia upon requests from the players.

Pre-Beta 3+ was one of the most successful versions that managed to put TSOG Online among the most popular mmorpg games of Itch.io. In addition, it was a version that was loved and became iconic especially by young people. In this version, the Developer Forest is in a chirpy spring mood and colorful leaves were falling everywhere.


All musics and menu wallpapers used in Pre-Beta 3+ belongs to their respective owners and no copyright infringement is intended.
